channel.title: Is there a way to host your rsps without portforwarding?
channel.description: Is there a way to host your rsps without portforwarding and without hamachi or any other software that players need to download. No vps too or anything else that costs? :confused:

item.title: Is there a way to host your rsps without portforwarding?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“xxx123xxx, post:8, topic:478478”]Didn’t some guy post a tutorial on how to do it with uTorrent?

Found it:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,383567.0.html[/quote]

Oh my what the fuuck. If you do it through uTorrent, it’s still port-forwarding.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a way to host your rsps without portforwarding?

item.title: Is there a way to host your rsps without portforwarding?
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

Also, clienthax made something that automatically port-forwards on server startup, google clienthax automatic portforwarding. Idk if the downloads work or not but I’m sure somebody mirrored, check the later posts

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a way to host your rsps without portforwarding?

item.title: Is there a way to host your rsps without portforwarding?
item.dc:creator: @Remake Remake
item.description:
@Remake wrote:

You can do it with Utorrent, but from my experience, it was really fucked up and I needed to restart Utorrent to log in. (Other players had no problem.)
But if you were willing to pay, you can have it VPS hosted, which allows your server to be hosted without you portforwarding/hosting it yourself.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a way to host your rsps without portforwarding?

item.title: Is there a way to host your rsps without portforwarding?
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“The Web Guy, post:4, topic:478478”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=596703.msg4201421#msg4201421 date=1358256388]

No. you must portfoward so players can connect to your server. why are you asking this?

Yes, actually. I’ve hosted Servers in the past without ever forwarding or opening anything.
[/quote]

How?[/quote]
This.

Read full topic
